pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, July 25, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, July 25, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of British Columbia, John Horgan.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Premier of British Columbia.

Foyer
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
